allow:
Bash(echo "Ready to push to GitHub! Please follow these steps:

1. Go to https://github.com and create a new repository
2. Name it ''VS-Code-Repo'' or similar
3. Make it PUBLIC (required for GitHub Pages)
4. Copy the commands GitHub gives you and run them here
5. The commands will look like:
   git remote add origin https://github.com/YOUR-USERNAME/REPO-NAME.git
   git branch -M main  
   git push -u origin main")
